title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas 
(Amendment) and Variation of Days (Drogheda and Dundalk) (No. 1) Order, 
2024 
This Order shall come into operation on 19th March 2024
text_norm: 1 order may cited district court district area (amendment) variation day (drogheda dundalk) (no 1) order 2024 order shall come operation 19th march 2024

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 ( S.I. No. 5
text_raw:
2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 ( S.I. No. 5 

of 1961), is hereby amended by— 

the substitution at reference number 166 for the matter in column (4) of the 
following: 

“Drogheda —First, Second, Third and Fourth Monday in each month. Third 
and Fourth Tuesday in each month. First and Second Thursday in each month. 
Fourth Friday in each month. All sittings at 10.00 a.m.”, and the substitution at 
reference number 167 for the matter in column (4) of the following: 

“Dundalk — First and Second Tuesday in each month. First, Second, Third and 
Fourth Wednesday in each month. Third and Fourth Thursday in each month. 
All sittings at 10.00 a.m.”
text_norm: 2 first schedule district court (areas) order 1961 ( s.i no 5 1961) hereby amended by-- substitution reference number 166 matter column (4) following drogheda --first second third fourth monday month third fourth tuesday month first second thursday month fourth friday month sitting 10.00 a.m substitution reference number 167 matter column (4) following dundalk -- first second tuesday month first second third fourth wednesday month third fourth thursday month sitting 10.00 a.m

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 3. The Second Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I.
text_raw:
3. The Second Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. 

No. 5 of 1961), is hereby amended by— 

the substitution at reference number 145 for the matter in column (4) of the 
following: 

“Drogheda —First, Second, Third and Fourth Monday in each month. Third 
and Fourth Tuesday in each month. First and Second Thursday in each month. 
Fourth Friday in each month. All sittings at 10.00 a.m.”, and the substitution at 
reference number 146 for the matter in column (4) of the following: 

“Dundalk — First and Second Tuesday in each month. First, Second, Third and 
Fourth Wednesday in each month. Third and Fourth Thursday in each month. 
All sittings at 10.00 a.m.” 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 5th March, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not 
completed before commencement of this Order shall be continued and 
completed as if this Order had been in force at the time at which such business 
had been initiated. 

[82] 3 

GIVEN under the Seal of the Courts Service, 

29 February, 2024. 

PAUL KELLY, 

Member of the Board of the Courts Service authorised to 
sign documents under the Seal of the Courts Service. 

DEIRDRE DOYLE, 

Officer of the Courts Service designated for the purpose of 
authenticating the Seal of the Courts Service, pursuant to 
section 10 of the Courts Service Act 1998. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [82]

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order provides for the variation of Days at Drogheda and Dundalk. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [82] 5
